channel.title: How do i make a npc say that im online?
channel.description: im using SvenScap3pk v2 source for my private server, and my player rights are 3 (owner) but it still sais the owner is offline? how do i fix it?

item.title: How do i make a npc say that im online?
item.dc:creator: @Click_Here Click Here
item.description:
@Click_Here wrote:

go to npc.handler, type ctrl and hold f, then type in the npc code, and ull see a line what requires you to type in the owners name, then below is a line which asks you what you want the npc to say.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a npc say that im online?
